title: Radio Replay: Prisons of Our Own Making
description: Discussions about healthy living usually revolve around diet and exercise. Social interaction is often left out of the conversation, even though research shows that it's critical to our well-being. On this week's radio replay, we'll explore research on the extremes of social interaction: from the consequences of constant connection, to the high cost of solitary confinement.
author: ideas@hiddenbrain.org (Hidden Brain Media)
